citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The IACUC’s facility and program review did not occur at the required every six months frequency this past year. A first
semi-annual review occurred on October 21, 2022, a second almost 8 months later on June 8th 2023 and a third 4
months later on October 19, 2023. Regular reviews are necessary to ensure adequate IACUC oversight and to ensure the
welfare of the animals being used in research by the facility. The IACUC must conduct a facility and program review at
least once every six months. Correct by April 1, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.31(c) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The IACUC’s facility and program review did not occur at the required every six months frequency this past year. A first 
semi-annual review  occurred on October 21, 2022, a second almost 8 months later on June 8th 2023 and a third 4 
months later on October 19, 2023. Regular reviews are necessary to ensure adequate IACUC oversight and to ensure the 
welfare of the animals being used in research by the facility. The IACUC must conduct a facility and program review at 
least once every six months. Correct by April 1, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
